unnormalised: Interesting transfer window! Mohun Bagan seems to be doing a Chennaiyin FC, bolstering their squad significantly. Will this translate to ISL glory, akin to Chak De! India's spirit? R. Sharma's move to East Bengal is a gamble. Prayag United needs a strong midfield to compete. The 10 km run to training better pay off! Let’s see if these Rs. 5 Crore signings justify the hype. All eyes on the Salt Lake Stadium.
